options.content:
### Etcd Availability Dashboard

Monitors etcd availability and performance across all HCP clusters.

**Health Targets:**
- Leader stability: < 5 changes per 24h
- No excessive leader churn (> 3 changes/hour)

**Performance SLOs (99th percentile):**
- WAL fsync duration: < 10ms
- Backend commit duration: < 25ms
- Peer network RTT: < 50ms

**Note:** Leader health is inferred from leader change stability (available metrics).

panels.description: Percentage of clusters with stable leadership - Target: > 95% - Shows what percentage of clusters have ≤5 leader changes in the last 24 hours, indicating healthy etcd leader stability.
panels.title: Fleet Leader Stability (24h)

panels.description: Average leader changes across fleet - Target: < 5 per 24h - Average number of leader elections across all clusters in the last 24 hours. High values indicate instability.
panels.title: Avg Leader Changes (24h)

panels.description: Total clusters monitored - Shows the total number of HCP clusters with etcd metrics being collected and available for monitoring.
panels.title: Total Clusters Monitored

panels.description: Fleet-wide 99th percentile WAL fsync duration - SLO target: < 10ms - Measures how long it takes to sync write-ahead log to disk. Critical for write performance.
panels.title: Fleet P99 WAL Fsync Duration

panels.description: Fleet-wide 99th percentile backend commit duration - SLO target: < 25ms - Measures how long it takes to commit data to the backend database. Impacts overall write latency.
panels.title: Fleet P99 Backend Commit Duration

panels.description: Fleet-wide 99th percentile peer network round-trip time - SLO target: < 50ms - Tracks network latency between etcd nodes (peers). High values cause slow replication and leader instability.
panels.title: Fleet P99 Peer Network RTT

panels.description: Average etcd database size across fleet - Warning: > 6GB - Shows average DB size. Large databases may need compaction and can impact performance.
panels.title: Fleet Avg DB Size

panels.description: Clusters exceeding WAL fsync SLO (> 10ms at p99) - Lists clusters with slow disk write performance. Check disk IOPS and storage health.

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, instance, le) (rate(etcd_disk_wal_fsync_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster!=""}[5m]))) * 1000) > 10

panels.title: WAL Fsync SLO Violations

panels.description: Clusters exceeding backend commit SLO (> 25ms at p99) - Lists clusters with slow database commits. May indicate disk or CPU pressure.

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, instance, le) (rate(etcd_disk_backend_commit_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster!=""}[5m]))) * 1000) > 25

panels.title: Backend Commit SLO Violations

panels.description: Clusters exceeding peer RTT SLO (> 50ms at p99) - Lists clusters with high network latency between etcd peers. Check network health and node placement.

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, instance, le) (rate(etcd_network_peer_round_trip_time_seconds_bucket{cluster!=""}[5m]))) * 1000) > 50

panels.title: Peer RTT SLO Violations

panels.description: Clusters with excessive leader instability (> 3 changes per hour) - Lists clusters experiencing frequent leader elections, indicating potential network or performance issues.
panels.title: Leader Instability (Hourly)

panels.description: Clusters with high leader churn (> 10 changes in 24h) - Lists clusters exceeding the stability threshold. Investigate network issues or resource constraints.
panels.title: Clusters with High Leader Churn

panels.description: Clusters with unstable leaders (> 5 changes in 24h) - Lists clusters approaching or exceeding the warning threshold for leader changes.
panels.title: Clusters with Unstable Leaders

panels.description: Distribution of etcd health across fleet - Shows count of stable vs. unstable clusters based on leader change frequency over 24 hours.
panels.title: Etcd Health Distribution

panels.description: Per-cluster leader change rate over time - Shows the rate of leader elections per minute for each cluster. Lower values indicate better stability.
panels.title: Per-Cluster Leader Changes Rate

panels.description: Leader changes per cluster (1h window) - Shows the number of leader elections in a rolling 1-hour window for each cluster. Helps identify instability patterns.
panels.title: Per-Cluster Leader Changes (1h window)

panels.description: Clusters with large database size (> 4GB) - Lists clusters with databases exceeding 50% of default quota. May need compaction or have excessive keys.
panels.title: Clusters with Large DB Size

panels.description: Fleet disk performance trends (P99) - Shows WAL fsync and backend commit latency trends over time. SLO thresholds displayed as reference lines.
panels.title: Fleet Disk Performance (P99)

panels.description: Fleet network performance trends (P99) - Shows peer-to-peer network latency trends over time. Spikes indicate network issues affecting raft consensus.
panels.title: Fleet Network Performance (P99)

panels.description: Fleet-wide proposal metrics over time
panels.title: Fleet Proposal Metrics
